#summary Describes the planar plottables that have been implemented. See also the list of GenericPlottables.
#labels Module-Blaise,Phase-Implementation

= Functions =

  * `PlaneFunctionGraph`: the graph of a simple function, with one input and one output

  * `PlaneParametricCurve`: a parametric curve, over a supplied range of parameters
  * `PlaneParametricArea`: a parametric area, over a square range of 2d parameters
